name: Proto (SuperSuckerStudios)
description:
A very short action platformer. Should only take a few minutes to play. I might be adding more levels at a later date. Leave any feedback you have in the comments, thanks for playing.

Controls

Arrow keys - left, right and jumping

Space bar to shoot - you can only shoot 2 bullets at a time and then it will recharge.

R - restarts game to first level.
